attributes.action: Make all party manifestos legally binding documents.
attributes.additional_details:
MP's that were elected on a manifesto that stated that the referendum would be honoured who have then subsequently breached said manifesto by voting against the original manifesto mandate have been elected on false pretences.
I petition that all future parties manifestos are legally binding documents and are enforceable should said party be elected.
attributes.background: In 2017 both Conservative and Labour Manifestos at the General Election stated that the referendum results would be honoured should they be elected.
